content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <metadata xml:lang="en"> <Esri> <CreaDate>20130625</CreaDate> <CreaTime>13543200</CreaTime> <ArcGISFormat>1.0</ArcGISFormat> <SyncOnce>TRUE</SyncOnce> <scaleRange> <minScale>150000000</minScale> <maxScale>5000</maxScale> </scaleRange> <ArcGISProfile>NAP</ArcGISProfile> <DataProperties> <itemProps> <imsContentType export="False">001</imsContentType> </itemProps> </DataProperties> </Esri> <dataIdInfo> <idAbs><DIV STYLE="text-align:Left;"><DIV><DIV><P><SPAN>The Day 1, 2 and 3 convective outlooks consist of a graphic depicting severe and general thunderstorm threats across the continental United States.</SPAN></P></DIV></DIV></DIV></idAbs> <searchKeys> <keyword>storms</keyword> <keyword>tornado</keyword> </searchKeys> <idPurp>Spc outlooks</idPurp> <idCitation> <resTitle>SPC_Outlooks</resTitle> </idCitation> <tpCat> <TopicCatCd value="004"> </TopicCatCd> </tpCat> <idCredit/> <resConst> <Consts> <useLimit/> </Consts> </resConst> </dataIdInfo> <Binary> <Thumbnail> <Data EsriPropertyType="PictureX"></Data> </Thumbnail> </Binary> <mdHrLv> <ScopeCd value="005"> </ScopeCd> </mdHrLv> <contInfo> <FetCatDesc> <compCode>True</compCode> <incWithDS>True</incWithDS> <catFetTyps> <genericName codeSpace="">Day 1 Hail Outlook</genericName> </catFetTyps> <catFetTyps> <genericName codeSpace="">Day 1 Wind Outlook</genericName> </catFetTyps> <catLang> <languageCode value="eng"> </languageCode> </catLang> </FetCatDesc> </contInfo> <mdChar> <CharSetCd value="004"> </CharSetCd> </mdChar> </metadata>
